data.description: OO as Hash, Array, Scalar, Code & Glob.
data.similar:
None. This module make a Perl object that work at the same time as
    Hash, Array, Scalar, Code & Glob, and work with tied references too.
    (Can't find a module with all the types/resources in the same time)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module return an object that works like a Hash, Array, Scalar,
    Code and Glob at the same time, and can work with tied references
    too.

    Need the namespace for future sub-modules and XS version...

    ** This module was made for XML::Smart, and is here to be used in
    any other place.
